Client.Name: Digital Earth Pacific Water Observatins from Space (WOfS)

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Water Observations from Space (WOfS) beta version product for Water Observations from Space (WOfS) is an annual summary of the temporal and spatial extent of surface water over landscapes. In essence, this highlights where water is usually or where it is rarely. The results are visualised to compare points in time spanning over a year, a season or multiple years. The dataset extends back historically to 2013.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Water Observations from Space (WOfS) beta version product for Water Observations from Space (WOfS) is an annual summary of the temporal and spatial extent of surface water over landscapes. In essence, this highlights where water is usually or where it is rarely. The results are visualised to compare points in time spanning over a year, a season or multiple years. The dataset extends back historically to 2013.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We are an experienced team, we have applied for LDN with you. It turns out that our own technical solution meets the requirements of FIL+. The Filecoin official website provides open source codes for many tools. We integrated some data processing and DC tool codes, combined with AI technology, and then developed our own data processing system.
